Top Tourist Attractions in Dubai

With a valid Tourist Visa for Dubai, you can enjoy the perfect blend of modern marvels and ancient culture. Don't miss these must-see spots:

  • Burj Khalifa: Get a bird‚Äôs-eye view of Dubai from the world‚Äôs tallest building.
  • The Dubai Mall: Shop, dine, and catch the famous Dubai Fountain show.
  • Palm Jumeirah: Discover luxury resorts and beaches on this iconic man-made island.
  • Dubai Creek: Ride a traditional abra and explore the historic heart of the city.
  • Jumeirah Beach: Sunbathe with the majestic Burj Al Arab in the background.
  • Global Village: Explore food, art, and culture from 90+ countries (seasonal).
  • Dubai Marina: Walk along the waterfront promenade, packed with restaurants and yachts.
  • Dubai Desert Safari: Enjoy dune bashing, camel rides, and a traditional Bedouin dinner.

Navigating the Dubai Tourist Visa Process

Applying for a Dubai Tourist Visa from India involves a few important steps. With multiple visa types, quick processing times, and evolving rules, it's crucial to understand the process thoroughly. Here's how to apply with ease:

  1. Determine Your Visa Type: Choose between 14-day, 30-day, or 60-day tourist visas depending on your travel plans and stay duration.
  2. Collect Required Documents: You‚Äôll typically need a valid passport, a passport-sized photo, confirmed return flight tickets, hotel bookings, and sometimes a bank statement.
  3. Submit Your Application: You can apply through an authorized travel agency or with the help of expert Dubai visa consultants like Global Visa Internationals.
  4. Wait for Processing: Most Dubai Tourist Visa applications are processed within 2 to 5 working days.
  5. Receive Your E-Visa: Once approved, the visa will be sent to your email and is linked to your passport.

Feeling overwhelmed? Let Global Visa Internationals make your Dubai visa application smooth and stress-free.
